mapper.select:
select
b.Flt_nbr flightNum,concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg, IFNULL(sum(a.Tit_Pre),0) ticketPriTotal,count(a.id) personNum, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(sum(a.Tit_Pre),0)/count(a.id),2) ticketPriAvg from traveler a LEFT JOIN airinfo b on a.eachflightinfo_id=b.id
GROUP BY leg
SELECT yBFare FROM fare where voyageCode=#{legQue};

select count(a.id) personNum,concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg, a.Frt_Spe frtSpe,IFNULL(sum(a.Tit_Pre),0) ticketPri from traveler a LEFT JOIN airinfo b on a.eachflightinfo_id=b.id
GROUP BY leg,frtSpe

select left(b.Flt_nbr,2) as carrier,b.Lcl_Dpt_Day flightDate,concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg, b.Flt_nbr flightNum,left(b.Flt_nbr,2) companyName,a.TKT_No ticketNum, (case when a.Pen_Tye=0 then '成人' when a.Pen_Tye=1 then '儿童' when a.Pen_Tye=2 then '婴儿' end) as penType ,a.Frt_Spe frtSpe,IFNULL(a.Tit_Pre,0) ticketPri from traveler a LEFT JOIN airinfo b on a.eachflightinfo_id=b.id
ORDER BY b.Lcl_Dpt_Day DESC limit #{begin},#{rows}

select TRUNCATE(SUM(b.Tal_Nbr)*100/(b.yBFare*sum(b.Pgs_Per_Cls)),2) avgDct, b.Flt_Nbr flightNum,concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg , SUM(b.Tal_Nbr) ticketPriTotal,sum(b.Pgs_Per_Cls) personNum, TRUNCATE(SUM(b.Tal_Nbr)/sum(b.Pgs_Per_Cls),2) ticketPriAvg from z_airdata b
GROUP BY leg;

SELECT concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg, SUM(Two_Tak_Ppt) twoTakPpt,SUM(Ful_Pce_Ppt) fulPcePpt,SUM(Nne_Dnt_Ppt) nneDntPpt, SUM(Eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt) ehtFiveDntPpt,SUM(Eht_Dnt_Ppt) ehtDntPpt, SUM(Sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt) senFiveDntPpt,SUM(Sen_Dnt_Ppt) senDntPpt, SUM(Six_Five_Dnt_Ppt) sixFiveDntPpt,SUM(Six_Dnt_Ppt) sixDntPpt, SUM(Fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt) fveFveDntPpt,SUM(Fve_Dnt_Ppt) fveDntPpt, SUM(Fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt) furFveDntPpt,SUM(Fur_Dnt_Ppt) furDntPpt, SUM(Thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt) thrFveDntPpt,SUM(Thr_Dnt_Ppt) thrDntPpt, SUM(Two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt) twoFveDntPpt,SUM(Two_Dnt_Ppt) twoDntPpt from z_airdata b
GROUP BY leg;
select a.Dct_Chr DctChr,a.Dct_Ppt DctPpt from airdiscount a where a.Cpy_Nm=#{CpyNm}

select concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg from traveler a LEFT JOIN airinfo b on a.eachflightinfo_id=b.id
GROUP BY leg

select left(b.Flt_nbr,2) as carrier,b.Lcl_Dpt_Day flightDate,concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg, b.Flt_nbr flightNum,left(b.Flt_nbr,2) companyName,a.TKT_No ticketNum, (case when a.Pen_Tye=0 then '成人' when a.Pen_Tye=1 then '儿童' when a.Pen_Tye=2 then '婴儿' end) as penType ,a.Frt_Spe frtSpe,IFNULL(a.Tit_Pre,0) ticketPri from traveler a LEFT JOIN airinfo b on a.eachflightinfo_id=b.id
ORDER BY b.Lcl_Dpt_Day DESC

select left(b.Flt_nbr,2) as carrier,b.Lcl_Dpt_Day flightDate,concat_ws('-',b.Dpt_AirPt_Cd,b.Arrv_Airpt_Cd) leg, b.Flt_nbr flightNum,left(b.Flt_nbr,2) companyName,a.TKT_No ticketNum, (case when a.Pen_Tye=0 then '成人' when a.Pen_Tye=1 then '儿童' when a.Pen_Tye=2 then '婴儿' end) as penType ,a.Frt_Spe frtSpe,IFNULL(a.Tit_Pre,0) ticketPri from traveler a LEFT JOIN airinfo b on a.eachflightinfo_id=b.id
ORDER BY ${order} ${sort} limit #{begin},#{rows}
select b.Lcl_Dpt_Day from z_airdata b WHERE b.Flt_nbr=#{flightNum} ORDER BY b.Lcl_Dpt_Day desc limit 0,1
